ScalarVariable.name: SensorOk
ScalarVariable.description: VRS sensor is OK (10 = OK, 11 = NOT OK).

ScalarVariable.name: Roll
ScalarVariable.description: Vessel roll in radians (Positive values = port up, negative values = port down)

ScalarVariable.name: Pitch
ScalarVariable.description: Vessel pitch in radians (Positive values = bow up, negative values = bow down).
